JsonUtilities
public static
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​JsonUtilities

This class is used to manually convert objects to Json strings. It is used for generating custom configuration files to be sent to the TouchFree Service.

Functions
ConvertToJson
public static string ConvertToJson(
string _name,
object _obj
)

Takes a variable name _name and an object _obj, determines the type of the object and returns a json string to represent the object.

ConvertObjectToJson
public static string ConvertObjectToJson(
object _obj
)

Takes an object _obj, determines the type of the object and returns a json string to represent the object.
